string.text: A .300 Blackout rifle made by Noveske Company.\n \n
Custom-made .300 Blackout Rifle equipped with a URX handguard and Noveske Receiver.\n \n
MCX Rattler with Canebrake handguard designed and manufactured by SIG Sauer, features a short-stroke gas piston system and integrated suppressor. Build for close-quarter situations.\n \n

Sig Sauer developed the MCX Virtus rifle for special forces. This MCX design is chambered in .300 AAC Blackout. A lightweight firearm as quiet as an MP5, as deadly as an AK-47, and more modular than anything ever designed.\n \n
The AAC Honey Badger is a personal defense weapon, frequently used in a suppressed configuration and is based on the AR-15. It is chambered in .300 AAC Blackout.\n \n
